radiographic_examinations.findings: Areas of signal loss with irregular contours consistent with the presence of fatty infiltration predominantly affecting the right lobe. No focal hepatic lesions or abnormal enhancement seen.

Kidneys and ureters normal, no renal, ureteral, or bladder stones, presence of heterogeneous, mixed-attenuation, nonenhancing debris in both dependent and nondependent portions of the bladder, mass in the dome of the bladder found to be 3 to 4 cm in diameter.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequently excised completely by partial cystectomy.
